title: PBE signups
body: Hi, I would normally try to post this in the PBE boards, but that relates to my problem. I signed up on the pbe signup page and it said i was eligible for one. I read that this would link my regular account to a new pbe account. However, I'm unable to log in to the pbe using the username and password that I'm using for my regular account. Any help? Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Your PBE account is not the same as your live account, so the credentials should be different.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) if this is still an issue, and our account team can help recover your pbe account.
